items.title: AccessibleMasks.org
items.summary: AccessibleMasks.org is a passion project Jacob and Patrick deHahn started in 2020 to address the challenge solid face masks presented to deaf and hard-of-hearing community members, among other individuals, AccessibleMasks.org was an online directory showcasing multiple vendors that sold transparent face masks.
items.content_html:
AccessibleMasks.org is a passion project Jacob and Patrick deHahn started in 2020 to address the challenge solid face masks presented to deaf and hard-of-hearing community members, among other individuals, 

 

AccessibleMasks.org was an online directory showcasing multiple vendors that sold transparent face masks.
